articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Europe pledges to boost aid to Sudan on unwelcome war anniversary - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Germany promises $260m as European diplomats meet in Paris to mark the first anniversary of the conflict.
articles.content:
Germany will provide 244 million euros ($260m) in humanitarian aid to Sudan, one year after the country plunged into war, as other European countries are also expected to pledge more funds.
